entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts. He is mentioned as being in charge of the students and is described as 'frowning' at Filch.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a teacher at Hogwarts who is being lectured by Hagrid. He is described as being 'nastily' added to his statement.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who does not want to go into the Forest. He is mentioned as having a 'note of panic' in his voice.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is pleased to hear Malfoy's note of panic. He is not explicitly described but is mentioned as being present in the scene.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school where Hagrid and Filch work. It is mentioned as having rules that students must follow.

relationships.description: Hagrid lectures Filch about his behavior.
Hagrid orders Malfoy to go into the Forest as punishment for his actions.
Filch is being lectured by Hagrid about his behavior.
